pullRequest.title: Fixed ScriptEngine parameter option removal
pullRequest.bodyText:
When one of the engines is unset the ScriptModuleTypeProvider clears all parameter options instead of only those that apply to that engine.
This fixes the Nashorn engine missing from the parameter options on the first openHAB startup.

beforeCommit.message:
Fix ScriptEngine parameter option removal

When one of the engines is unset the ScriptModuleTypeProvider clears all parameter options instead of only those that apply to that engine.
This fixes the Nashorn engine missing from the parameter option on the first openHAB startup.

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

nodes.bodyText: Not too nice to call "createScriptEngine" here, but it seems to be the only way to get hold of the mimeTypes to remove...
